long_description: The Shimano replacement pin kit for 10-speed chains is a great item to carry along on rides for easy chain repair in the field. This is the pin required to reconnect Shimano 10-speed chains; (avoid re-using old pin per Shimano's Technical Standards). Built-in guide eases installation by holding chain together while chain tool is being attached; guideline section is easily removed after installation.
short_description: The Shimano replacement pin kit for 10-speed chains is a great item to carry along on rides for easy chain repair in the field.
